mapper.select: select * from user_point_prize where login_name = #{loginName} and date_format(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} and reality is true;
select u.* from user_point_prize u join point_prize t on u.`point_prize_id` = t.`id` and t.`name` != 'ThankYou' where u.login_name = #{loginName} and u.reality is true order by u.created_time desc
select u.* from user_point_prize u join point_prize t on u.`point_prize_id` = t.`id` and t.`name` != 'ThankYou' order by u.created_time desc limit 0,100
select count(*) from user_point_prize where reality is false;

SELECT p.`id`, p.description, temp.num FROM point_prize p JOIN (SELECT u.`point_prize_id`, COUNT(*) AS num FROM user_point_prize u WHERE u.reality IS TRUE GROUP BY u.`point_prize_id`) temp ON p.`id` = temp.`point_prize_id`

SELECT u.`created_time`, u.`login_name`, r.`mobile`, a.`identity_number` FROM user_point_prize u JOIN account a ON u.`login_name` = a.`login_name` JOIN `user` r ON u.`login_name` = r.`login_name` WHERE u.reality IS TRUE and u.point_prize_id = #{pointPrizeId} order by u.created_time desc
